name: Relax
description: A relaxing pear vape. It is pretty good after 3 days but just gets better over time as everything amalgamates.
author: InsidiousBrew

reviews.text: This is really good. Pear on the inhale and not too much coconut on the exhale.  A really good balance for my taste. Waited 3 days to try it out. Been looking for a nice pear vape and I think I found a good one. Not too sweet either. Thank you for sharing.

Wayyyy too much Pear! Can't really taste anything over that at all! Now maybe it's me, but it's been almost a week and that's all I'm getting... Its a nice idea for a recipe but it needs some fine tuning (imo) 
*** Not trying to be harsh, just trying to give you honest feedback. Hope this helps...ðŸ™‚
